     """
     These tests validates that

@@ -27,9 +27,10 @@
 class StreamsBrokerCompatibility(Test):
     """
     These tests validates that
-    - Streams 0.11+ w/ EOS fails fast for older brokers 0.10.2 and 0.10.1
-    - Streams 0.11+ w/o EOS works for older brokers 0.10.2 and 0.10.1
-    - Streams fails fast for 0.10.0 brokers
+    - Streams works for older brokers 0.11 (or newer)
+    - Streams w/ EOS-alpha works for older brokers 0.11 (or newer)
+    - Streams fails fast for older brokers 0.10.0, 0.10.2, and 0.10.1
+    - Streams w/ EOS-beta fails fast for older brokers 2.4 or older

nodes.bodyText:
This is covered via test_fail_fast_on_incompatible_brokers that tests against 0.10.0, 0.10.1 and 0.10.2 already
In older KS versions, 0.10.1 and 0.10.2 where only not supported if EOS is used, but now those older brokers are not supported at all any longer, and thus, we can merge both tests.
This is an existing test (the diff is just weird)

nodes.bodyText: Add this new test as side cleanup -- not sure why we never tested EOS for older broker but only non-EOS?
@guozhangwang New special log message for old brokers.
Smaller improvement: write input data with transactions, too.
We have only one broker in this test and want to test with EOS
